column4: Anyone here have any idea why I would be able to ping "www.google.com" etc from shell ....but no other net works?.....if I put in the actual ip address and eg. http://xxx.xxx.xxx I can get one page up.......something to do with dns?
i pinged my dns servers and ran the adsl modem tests...... net works every where but in linux
sounds like dns...google.com is probally being cached
